module.name: default
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" ;; *-osf*) CFLAGS="-O2 -std1" ;; *-hpux*) CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CC="gcc" CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
cat <<_EOT_ >config.local GCOPTS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" DIR_BIN=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin DIR_LIB=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib DIR_INC=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include DIR_MAN=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man DIR_HTML=${_docdir} MANSCHEME="bsd-source-cat" HTML=yes LIBGL=no LIBIMAGE=no STRIP=: ZIP=no _EOT_
./configure -with-CC=${CC:-cc} --noninteractive
